import Mathlib

variables {ğ•œ : Type*} [NormedField ğ•œ]
variables {X Y : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup X] [NormedSpace ğ•œ X]
variables [NormedAddCommGroup Y] [NormedSpace ğ•œ Y]

open ContinuousLinearMap

/-- Operator norm satisfies the triangle inequality: â€–A + Bâ€– â‰¤ â€–Aâ€– + â€–Bâ€–. -/
theorem opNorm_add_le (A B : X â†’L[ğ•œ] Y) :
    ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm (A + B) â‰¤ ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A + ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm B :=
  by sorry

/-- Operator norm scales with scalars: â€–a â€¢ Aâ€– = â€–aâ€– * â€–Aâ€–. -/
theorem opNorm_smul (a : ğ•œ) (A : X â†’L[ğ•œ] Y) :
    ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm (a â€¢ A) = â€–aâ€– * ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A :=
  by sorry

/-- Operator norm is nonnegative. -/
theorem opNorm_nonneg (A : X â†’L[ğ•œ] Y) : 0 â‰¤ ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A :=
  by sorry

/-- Operator norm is zero iff the map is the zero map. -/
theorem opNorm_eq_zero_iff (A : X â†’L[ğ•œ] Y) :
    ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A = 0 â†” A = 0 :=
  by sorry

import Mathlib

variable (ğ•œ : Type _) [NormedField ğ•œ]
variable {E : Type _} {F : Type _}
variable [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ğ•œ E]
variable [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ğ•œ F]

open ContinuousLinearMap

/-- Operator norm satisfies the triangle inequality: â€–A + Bâ€– â‰¤ â€–Aâ€– + â€–Bâ€–. -/
theorem opNorm_add_le (A B : E â†’L[ğ•œ] F) :
    ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm (A + B) â‰¤ ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A + ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm B :=
  by sorry

/-- Operator norm scales with scalars: â€–a â€¢ Aâ€– = â€–aâ€– * â€–Aâ€–. -/
theorem opNorm_smul (a : ğ•œ) (A : E â†’L[ğ•œ] F) :
    ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm (a â€¢ A) = â€–aâ€– * ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A :=
  by sorry

/-- Operator norm is nonnegative. -/
theorem opNorm_nonneg (A : E â†’L[ğ•œ] F) : 0 â‰¤ ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A :=
  by sorry

/-- Operator norm is zero iff the map is the zero map. -/
theorem opNorm_eq_zero_iff (A : E â†’L[ğ•œ] F) :
    ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A = 0 â†” A = 0 :=
  by sorry

args.natural_language_statement: Translate to Lean4: Let ğ•œ be a normed field, E and F normed spaces over ğ•œ. State these theorems: 1) opNorm (A + B) â‰¤ opNorm A + opNorm B for A B : E â†’L[ğ•œ] F. 2) opNorm (a â€¢ A) = â€–aâ€– * opNorm A for a : ğ•œ, A : E â†’L[ğ•œ] F. 3) 0 â‰¤ opNorm A. 4) opNorm A = 0 â†” A = 0. Use Mathlib import and end each theorem with := by sorry. Do not prove them.
